data.actual_result: The first window opens further at the bottom, you have to scroll up to see latest entries and filters
data.expected_result: The first window should open at the top, showing the latest logs
data.short_description: Opening Audit Logs twice makes the first log window open in a wrong position
data.steps_to_repro: - Have access to Audit Logs in a server with enough entries, so you can scroll - Open server settings - Press on "Audit Log" twice fast, so the app opens two Audit Log "windows"
